title: Interesting Picture
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Umi, can I clean up that shelf over there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yeah. We sure have accumulated a lot of stuff in this room...... Phew.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>This was originally only Nico-chan’s stuff, but ever since we joined, there’s so much more stuff.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ah, this...... Maki, Maki!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Here, take a look at this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>......What kind of picture is this? What a weird angle.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>This was most likely taken by Nico while she was spying on us when we first started practicing at the shrine. She usually hid in this spot.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Nico-chan wouldn’t like it if she found this picture, but she also didn’t get rid of it......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Nico must have saved it for a reason. Let’s hide it again.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
